Talents.Name: Sublimity
Talents.Description: When <Operator Name> or a "Freeling" defeats an enemy, <Operator Name> gains ATK +2%, stacking up to 15 times

Talents.Name: Finishing Touch
Talents.Description: The first attack after deployment will summon a "Freeling" (lasts for 25 seconds) at the target's location (only on deployable ground tiles)
